adjectives.description: infralittoral (comparative more infralittoral, superlative most infralittoral)

entries.meaning: Situated in the region of shallow water nearest the shore.
examples: Some marine biologists also recognize supralittoral and infralittoral fringes, which are wetted only by extreme high tides or high waves  […]

entries.meaning: The region of shallow water closest to the shore; in marine environments, usually excluding the intertidal zone.
